summary:
Seattle is a big city in the state of Washington, USA. It's by the sea and has a lot of history. Native Americans lived there for thousands of years before European settlers arrived in 1851. The city grew quickly and became important for trade and building ships. After World War II, companies like Boeing made Seattle a big technology hub.

Seattle is known for its music, especially jazz and rock. Many famous musicians started here. The city is also home to big companies like Microsoft and Amazon. It's one of the fastest-growing cities in the USA and has a diverse population.
title: Seattle
